stories.title: Number Input
stories.description: As a user, I want to input numbers so that I can perform calculations

stories.title: Addition Operation
stories.description: As a user, I want to add two numbers so that I can get their sum

stories.title: Subtraction Operation
stories.description: As a user, I want to subtract one number from another so that I can get the difference

stories.title: Multiplication Operation
stories.description: As a user, I want to multiply two numbers so that I can get their product

stories.title: Division Operation
stories.description: As a user, I want to divide one number by another so that I can get the quotient

stories.title: Result Display
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the calculation result so that I know the answer

stories.title: Clear Function
stories.description: As a user, I want to clear the input and result so that I can start a new calculation

stories.title: Decimal Input
stories.description: As a user, I want to input decimal numbers so that I can perform precise calculations

stories.title: Error Handling for Division by Zero
stories.description: As a user, I want to see an error message when dividing by zero so that I avoid incorrect results

summary: Build a simple calculator with basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide), number input, result display, and clear function to enable users to perform everyday calculations efficiently.
